presentation_title: Doughlicious: Crafting Joy, One Gourmet Cookie at a Time

title_slide.title: Doughlicious: Crafting Joy, One Gourmet Cookie at a Time

slides.title: Cookie Fatigue
slides.body:
• The market is filled with mass-produced, artificial cookies.
• Local bakeries offer quality but lack convenience and scale.
• Consumers crave unique, high-quality treats that feel special.
slides.image_prompt: A supermarket aisle with generic, plastic-wrapped cookie packages under harsh fluorescent lighting, looking unappetizing.

slides.title: Our Solution
slides.body:
• Artisanal, small-batch cookies with rotating, seasonal flavors.
• A seamless tech-first experience for online ordering and delivery.
• A warm, inviting brand that builds community and delight.
slides.image_prompt: A modern, bright bakery counter with a friendly barista handing a beautiful branded box of cookies to a smiling customer.

slides.title: Market Opportunity
slides.body:
• TAM: $62B Global Confectionery Market.
• SAM: $11B US Gourmet Cookie & Snack Market.
• SOM: $5M Target in 3 major cities in Year 1.
slides.image_prompt: An infographic-style illustration showing three concentric circles representing TAM, SAM, and SOM with clean, modern icons.

slides.title: Gourmet Flavors
slides.body:
• We use premium ingredients like Valrhona chocolate and local dairy.
• Our menu features unique monthly drops to drive repeat visits.
slides.image_prompt: Stunning macro shot of a freshly baked sea salt chocolate chip cookie, warm light, a wisp of steam rising, on a rustic wooden board.

slides.title: Revenue Streams
slides.body:
• Direct-to-Consumer: In-store sales and local online delivery.
• Corporate Gifting: Branded boxes for client and employee appreciation.
• Catering & Events: Custom orders for parties and gatherings.

slides.title: Why We Win
slides.body:
• Superior Product: Unforgettable taste from premium ingredients.
• Strong Brand: A lifestyle brand focused on joy and connection.
• Tech-Enabled: Efficient operations and a frictionless customer app.

slides.title: Customer Love
slides.body:
• 10k+ waitlist signups pre-launch.
• 4.9 star rating from our initial pop-up events.
slides.image_prompt: A beautiful collage of Instagram posts and glowing customer reviews about cookies, arranged in a clean, modern grid.

slides.title: Competitive Edge
slides.body:
• Crumbl Cookies ($1B+ sales) - Limited weekly rotation, quality concerns | Our advantage: Artisanal quality with greater flavor diversity.
• Insomnia Cookies (Acquired by Krispy Kreme) - Focus on late-night delivery | Our advantage: Premium daytime and corporate gifting focus.

slides.title: Growth Strategy
slides.body:
• Launch flagship store and build a strong local following.
• Expand delivery zones and partner with corporate clients.
• Introduce a national shipping program in Year 2.
slides.image_prompt: A minimalist map of a city with pins dropping in key neighborhoods, illustrating a delivery expansion strategy.

slides.title: Founding Team
slides.body:
• Elena Garcia, CEO & Head Baker - classically trained pastry chef, formerly at Tartine Bakery.
• David Chen, COO - 10 years in logistics and operations at DoorDash.
• Aisha Mohammed, CMO - Scaled brand marketing for direct-to-consumer food startup Sweetgreen.

slides.title: Financial Outlook
slides.body:
• Projecting $1.2M in revenue in Year 1 with one location.
• Scaling to $8M ARR by Year 3 with multi-city expansion.
• Targeting 25% EBITDA margin at scale through operational efficiency.
slides.image_prompt: A simple, elegant bar chart showing projected revenue growth over three years, using the presentation's color palette.

slides.title: Our Ask
slides.body:
• We are raising $750,000 in seed funding.
• Funds will be used for: 40% Flagship Store Build-Out, 35% Marketing & Branding, and 25% Operational Headcount.
